member.summary: Check if a node is significant (exists in schema). Filters out anonymous tokens and unsupported node types.

member.name: T:LoraxMod.ModuleInitializer
member.summary:
Module initializer to configure native library resolution for tree-sitter DLLs.
Solves: When LoraxMod.dll is loaded from external path (e.g., via PWSH_MCP_MODULES), .NET's default resolver doesn't search the module directory for P/Invoke dependencies. This causes all tree-sitter language DLLs to fail loading.
Solution: Register custom resolver that searches runtimes/{RID}/native/ and bin/ directories.

member.name: T:LoraxMod.TreeSitterNode
member.summary: Adapter to wrap TreeSitter.DotNet nodes as INodeInterface.

member.name: T:LoraxMod.Parser
member.summary: High-level parser wrapping tree-sitter for a specific language. Uses TreeSitter.DotNet for native bindings.

member.name: F:LoraxMod.Parser.LanguageIdMap
member.summary: Language ID mapping: User-friendly name -> TreeSitter.DotNet name. TreeSitter.DotNet uses hyphens (c-sharp) but users expect no hyphens (csharp).

member.name: M:LoraxMod.Parser.LoadEmbeddedSchema(System.String)
member.summary: Load schema from embedded resource in the DLL. Resource names follow pattern: LoraxMod.schemas.{language}.json

member.summary: Find and extract all nodes of specific types.

member.summary: Get the identity field for a node type (usually 'name').

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaReader.GetChildrenTypes(System.String)
member.summary: Get possible child node types (for nodes without named fields). Some nodes use positional children instead of named fields.

member.name: T:LoraxMod.SchemaCache
member.summary:
Schema cache for fetching and caching grammar files from GitHub.
Fetches node-types.json and grammar.json from tree-sitter grammar repositories using the exact revisions specified in tree-sitter-language-pack's language_definitions.json.
Cache is invalidated when loraxmod version changes.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetCacheDir
member.summary: Get versioned cache directory.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.FetchUrlAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Fetch URL content.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetLanguageDefinitionsAsync
member.summary: Get language definitions (repo URLs and revisions). Cached after first fetch.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.BuildFileUrl(System.Text.Json.JsonElement,System.String)
member.summary: Build raw GitHub URL for a file in src/.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.FetchAndCacheAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Fetch a file from GitHub and cache it.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetSchemaPathAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get path to cached node-types.json for a language. Fetches from GitHub if not cached.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.GetGrammarPathAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Get path to cached grammar.json for a language. Fetches from GitHub if not cached.

member.name: M:LoraxMod.SchemaCache.ClearCache
member.summary: Clear all cached schemas.

member.summary: List languages with cached schemas.

member.summary: Get list of all available languages.
